originalText.text: I have never worked with them, but their recruiters somehow got my email and UNLISTED mobile number and keep pestering me to use them to fill our open positions, something they would know I have no control over if they actually knew my role. They are blatantly violating TCPA and CAN-SPAM acts and should be fined.

originalText.text: Great agency to work for. They are always checking in on their employees to make sure everything is ok. They pay on time as long as the employee submit the time sheet. They make you feel like you matter and the work that you are doing counts for something. They came through for me when I needed a job. I must say that so for working for them has been very pleasant.

originalText.text: I am working in InfoPeople Corp from Last October, and I am so grateful I was hired. This culture is so positive, caring, and so many people have gone out of their way to help me. The company truly cares about your career and salary and benefits package is also very competitive. I recommend.

originalText.text: After working with Infopeople corporation for about 2 years, I can tell that INFOPEOPLE is one of the best Consulting Firms that I have ever worked with for the past 23 years of my IT experience.  They rendered very professional service and in fact, I got a pay raise based on the feed back from my Clients whom I worked with which is unusual for a consultant to get a raise while working on the same project.

originalText.text: I have been with Infopeople for the last 2 years and am really happy with my job. All of them are  very helpful. Recruiters here are very professional with their dedication and pays attention to every detail of staffing requirements.
